original_text: So I caused the priests of your temple to become ashamed. I caused enemies to destroy Israel. I let them insult Jacob's descendants.’ So I caused the priests of your temple to become ashamed. I caused enemies to destroy Israel. I let them insult Jacob's descendants.’ So I caused the priests of your temple
korean_text: 그러므로 내가 성소의 어른들에게 욕되게 하며 야곱이 진멸 당하도록 내어 주며 이스라엘이 비방 거리가 되게 하리라

sentences.original_text: of your temple to become ashamed
I caused enemies to destroy Israel
I let them insult Jacob's descendants
sentences.korean_translation: 내가 그들이 야곱의 자손을 모욕하게 내버려두었다
